div.ab: give her authority, that she and her servants may go away with good licentia: Madame, go with royalty, with good licentia and you and your servants with God (can't make out the rest), and so she goes away. When it (the child?) sees the name, so must it let the light in, and must open the window. And one must not ask her too much at once, otherwise she does not say what is true(???).
And one may also ask whether one is dead or alive. If he is alive, so will he stand healthy(???). If he is dead, he comes with a burn on his head.
